M. Salgado
A. Cunha
dcterms:description: The Red Lesion Endoscopy Dataset consists of 3,295 images obtained from video capsule endoscopies, including 1,131 images with lesions and 2,164 without lesions. The dataset is used for detecting red lesions in the small bowel, a critical area for diagnosing bleeding and other gastrointestinal issues.
dcterms:title: Red Lesion Endoscopy Dataset
